page.title: 16CHURCHES IN THE AREA.
page.content: There are seven churches in the area,five of them in West Kirby,one in Newton and one in Caldy.The churches are West Kirby Unitarian Free Church, St.Bridgets Church which is Church of England,the Church of the Resurrection and All Saints in Caldy which is C.of E.,the Elim Pentecostal Church,St Agnes Church which is Roman Catholic, Westbourne Road Methodist Church and St Michael and All Angels which is C.of E.and is in Newton. All of the churches have a Sunday School for children and the sizes of the congregations vary from 20 to 280 for services on a Sunday.Some of the churches have choirs and five of them have youth organisations connected to the church.All of the churches allow their premises to be used by the community organisations during the week.
